navigation.menu_prompt: Where would you like to go ?

about.title: Who Am I ?
about.description:
üéí I've been immersed in technology since I was a kid ‚Äî a passion that naturally led me to pursue a career in this field.

üíª Today, I'm a professional web developer. My journey, driven by curiosity, has allowed me to build solid technical skills while nurturing my creativity. Innovation is at the core of everything I do.

üéØ I'm currently offering my services as a freelance developer, with a clear goal: to contribute to ambitious projects where my skills can truly make a difference ‚Äî all while continuing to learn and innovate! I'm ready to turn your ideas into real, impactful solutions.

üìç Based in the Paris area ‚Äî Available immediately

0.name: Spotr
0.description: Spotr is a mobile application designed for photographers in search of unique locations. It allows users to easily scout, save, and explore photo spots around the world.

1.name: Lift Up
1.description: Lift Up is a mobile application aimed at bodybuilding and fitness enthusiasts. Its goal is to optimize workouts by enabling users to create personalized programs, instantly convert weights, and track their BMI.

2.name: Bumble B
2.description: Developed as part of my final school project, Bumble B is a mobile application that controls a small car equipped with an ESP32 module provided by the school.

3.name: Konbini Website
3.description: I was responsible for the homepage redesign. I also contributed to the integration of new features and to the optimization of the user experience.

4.name: HairSwift
4.description: A project built to explore the capabilities of Go. It enables efficient management of a hair salon, with features like appointment scheduling, staff management, and service tracking.

5.name: Bitjutsu
5.description: This project was created to practice token integration in a real-world application. It is an app that allows users to edit images via text prompts using the Replicate API.
